<h1>👋 Hi, I'm Navneet Yadav 🎯 Aspiring DevOps Engineer | Passionate Learner | Cloud & Automation Enthusiast  Welcome to my GitHub! I'm a fresher DevOps Engineer actively building hands-on experience in:  🚀 CI/CD Pipelines | ⚙️ Jenkins & GitHub Actions ☁️ Cloud Platforms (AWS) | 🐳 Docker & Kubernetes 🛠️ Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Ansible) 🔐 DevSecOps Tools (Trivy, SonarQube, Gitleaks)</h1>
